title: My Brother Cant gift me skins.
body: Is anyone else having an issue, Hes been trying repeatedly since yesterday and he can't gift any skins to me. :T

replies.body: What exactly is the error message your brother is seeing when he tries to send you a gift? There are a few different factors that determine if you can gift someone. Make sure to double check our [**Gifting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964) to see if you're missing one of those requirements, like making sure you've been friends for at least 24 hours.
